bill_title: authorize a winter load increase of certain motor vehicle weight restrictions.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize a winter load increase of certain motor vehicle weight restrictions. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 32-22 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The maximum axle and axle group loadings established in § 32-22-16 are increased by ten percent between the dates set by the Transportation Commission for each frost zone established by the commission based on a freezing index model each winter. However, this increase does not apply to any bridge or highway that has a posted weight limitation. Section 2. That chapter 32-22 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The Transportation Commission shall, by resolution, establish, limit, and modify the duration of the ten percent increase in load limits and the establishment of the frost zones. 170 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.098 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
